name: Vengeful Ghost
movement: flies at 40 feet speed, no walking speed
description: The Vengeful Ghost is an incorporeal entity representing the unfinished business of a deceased individual. It possesses a haunting presence with a glowing, translucent form characterized by its intense glare and anguished demeanor.
memorable: Its ability to possess living beings and inflict magical aging makes it a particularly haunting adversary.
goals: To resolve unfinished business and exact revenge on those who wronged it.
relations: Often associated with other undead creatures or dark spirits that share similar motives.
environment: Typically found in haunted locations or places of emotional turmoil.
strengths: Immunities to cold, necrotic, and poison damage, along with the ability to move through solid objects.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage, making it especially susceptible to clerics and paladins.
attacks: Withering Touch delivers necrotic damage and has a potential magical aging effect on frightened targets.
most_powerful_ability: Possession allows the ghost to take control of a humanoid, rendering them unconscious while granting the ghost new abilities.
senses: Can see both the Material and Ethereal Plane due to Ethereal Sight, enhancing its tactical advantage.
additional_information: Resilient against many damage types but weak to radiant.
Can haunt and intimidate foes effectively.
Returns after 24 hours unless properly put to rest.
Impose disadvantage on foes' saving throws against fear effects in darkness.
Can reactively frighten attackers when damaged.
test_queries: undead spirit with magical aging ability
haunting ghost causing fear and terror
